summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account as of November 30, 2014. It details the account balance, transactions, and provides instructions for addressing errors or inquiries related to the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account balance as of November 30, 2014, was $203,307.93.
There were no overdraft fees or NSF item fees for the statement period.
The document provides instructions for reporting errors or inquiries related to the account.
The account is managed by Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The document includes contact information for customer service regarding account issues.
